item.title: Quest interface (Client sided)
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

Alright fist let me show you guys the snippets.

[code=java]public static void questtab(Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4[] wid)
{
Class9 class9 = addTab4(24100);
addText(24046, “Quest Points: 0”, wid, 0, 0xFF9442);
addText9(7381, “”, wid, 1, 0xFF9442, “Champions’ Challenge”);

    class9.anInt261 = 260;

    class9.anIntArray240 = new int[14];

I want to add another quest, so how would I do that?
Here’s a screenshot of the quest tab.

http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35255160/myscrenshot_.jpg
My photobucket isn’t working so you’ll have to downlaod the small image.
Please help a noob out.
